Package com.cmas.controller

Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
com.cmas.controller.EnquiryManager
public class EnquiryManager extends Object
Controller class that manages operations related to Enquiries, such as adding, deleting, and updating Enquiries.
Since:
2023-11-18

  • Method Details

    • getAllEnquiries

      public static HashMap<UUID,Enquiry> getAllEnquiries()
      Retrieves all Enquiries from the database.
      Returns:
      A HashMap containing all Enquiries, where the key is the Enquiry UID.

    • getEnquiry

      public static Enquiry getEnquiry(UUID enquiryUID)
      Retrieves a specific Enquiry based on its UID.
      Parameters:
      enquiryUID - The UID of the Enquiry to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Enquiry object corresponding to the provided UID.

    • addNewEnquiry

      public static void addNewEnquiry(Enquiry enquiry, Student student)
      Adds a new Enquiry to the database, associating it with a specific Student.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - The Enquiry object to be added.
      student - The Student associated with the Enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public static void deleteEnquiry(UUID enquiryUID, Student student)
      Deletes a specific Enquiry from the database and removes associated references.
      Parameters:
      enquiryUID - The UID of the Enquiry to be deleted.
      student - The Student associated with the Enquiry.

    • updateEnquiryQuery

      public static void updateEnquiryQuery(String query, UUID enquiryUID)
      Updates the query of a specific Enquiry.
      Parameters:
      query - The new query for the Enquiry.
      enquiryUID - The UID of the Enquiry to be updated.

    • updateEnquiryStatus

      public static void updateEnquiryStatus(UUID enquiryUID)
      Updates the status of a specific Enquiry to indicate that it has been processed.
      Parameters:
      enquiryUID - The UID of the Enquiry to be updated.

    • updateEnquiryReply

      public static void updateEnquiryReply(String reply, UUID enquiryUID, User replier)
      Updates the reply of a specific Enquiry.
      Parameters:
      reply - The new reply for the Enquiry.
      enquiryUID - The UID of the Enquiry to be updated.
      replier - The User that replied to the enquiry

    • printEnquiryDetails

      public static void printEnquiryDetails(UUID enquiryUID)
      Prints the details of an Enquiry.
      Parameters:
      enquiryUID - The UID of the Enquiry to be printed.
